original_title: Lust Pur - Conny bei den Antjes
overview: To the Netherlands! There are hot fries and the most beautiful "Meisjes", that is girls. The journey in the motorhome becomes an exciting sextrip for Conny Dachs. Lullu, the passenger, cares for him in the rest area on the A3. At the edge of the street, they snatch the sweet hitchhiker Holly. The little bitch is bi-sexual and totally unrestrained. At first she sucks Lullu on the back seat without thinking. In the morning, she gives gas to Conny. An absolutely horny Roadtrip, with which not only the long-running Conny comes fully at its expense.
title: Lust Pur - Conny bei den Antjes
